title: LFM Ranked Team, Aim Diamond V
body:
Hi all
I'm a Plat V player and hoping to start a ranked team with the hopes to reach diamond before the season ends

Not sure if starting a new team or finding a plat/diamond team to continue from

If anyone is interested either comment here or add me on league

I'm a chill guy who doesn't flame so don't worry

IGN: Mr Spook

replies.body: Plat 5 main mid, huge champion pool and can fill other roles when needed, ign is Axolotl, add me :p
Gold 5 here more then willing to play any role though probably most confident in top play feel free to add me if intersted

heya... im G1 main support - IGN: realskes

dont flame at all.. but keen for whatever.

I'm a supp main, can also jng, free a lot and pretty chill (at least I like to think so). Gold V (but mostly stopped there cause I just wanted the skin). I mostly wanna play teams to get the ward skin but I wouldn't say no to a diamond border in norms ey. Only rule is if I'm not having fun I won't play. Mostly play {{champion:267}}
im gold 5 keen to join :P and can play all lanes but adc
